column5: Hey all Just going to make a short report here, its been quite a while since i have posted one and even longer since a successful one lol. So here goes... Day started around 8 when we arrived in Gilford.... lines in the water ready to go at 9 and sure enough first drop in the water and fish on... a decent 12" perch would start out the day nicely. Although we were nice and comfortable in the hut outside there were some good gusts of wind and some whiteout conditions (brought the GPS just in case) This was our initial greeting    After the first hour my Brother hooks into what he figures is a small perch until his reel starts screaming. He didnt know what it was, ended up being a little pike    The weather liked switching back and forth... it was continuously windy and cold though but snow and clouds came and went    Moved around after the bite stopped and it helped... we got to a spot with nonstop action at the end of the day and we couldnt keep our lines in the water... Mostly fish in the 7-10" range but a bunch of 5-6" dinks and a few over 10    Overall an enjoyable day on the water and I am glad to see the water is now hard. As for ice conditions. Well operators were putting there huts out in the afternoon with argos and quads so it seems to be "safe" we found from 4" to 7" on the Gilford side but we sure didn't cover the whole bay so its not to say it is all accessible or safe. Hope ya enjoyed the report.
That's a good day by anyones standards. Those weather pictures are pretty impressive. Nice report. You should write them more often.  -Ramble

Thanks for the report Bill. glad to hear someone had a good day. i would like to do the catch and release thing but i cant. cause i believe the first part of that is to actually catch a fish---lol    Dann

Thanks to the both of you... Ohh and if I had more successful days on the water I would be making more reports lol... looks like this Ice will stick so I hope to have a few more days like today and some with a few real Jumbo's
Ohh yea and If anyone is out one day and sees me, knock on the door and say Hi... I am sporting an OFC sticker on the front door If ya'll didn't notice.
Hey Bill. if you see my hut stop by and say high aswell. and that goes for anyone else..   Dann
Way to go Bill I new you could do it .
congrats on a good day
Good report glad to see the ice is back hope it stays  rob
Great report Bill! Glad y'all got into some fish!!!   You can post bigger pics if you'll upload to photobucket, no resizing hassels... just upload the pics, copy there and paste here!
Good report and good work locating the fish, WTG...
thanks for sharing.
goos report I guess it's time I get my butt in gear and do some fishing
Great report Bill.  It must have been windy out there yesterday, glad you were rewarded for your efforts.
Thanks for the update.  Will be there next Saturday!

Hey bill thats some good perch fishing  !!!!!.  ..well at least you did better than the last time  you me and dan were out....it looked like you had the place all to yourself,were you out in the same spot we were out in a few weeks back????...great report & pics too,talk to you later bill,are you still up for that quinte trip we all had planned.....cheers
WHERE WAS MY PHONE CALL!!!! LOL...  Nice outing man!  G
Way to go Bill, nice report. I still hope to get out there myself!

Nice stuff Bill.  The wind was cold enough just filling my gas tank here in town I can imagine what it was like on the lake.  Hope to be out there next weekend and would be great to see some other OFNers out three.
Looks like you had a great day out on the water Bill...Congrats and thanks for the sharing

Sure thing skeeter... i am thinking I will make a thread for everyone to post a pic of their hut so if we see eachother we can Identify OFNers...  Glen... The pics were emailed from another computer and were made into like 15kb's instead of the normal MB's they take up... I do use photobucket.  Shawn... Different spot altogether where we caught fish. Started Shallow and had good action then moved when it slowed and kept moving till we got on em et the end of the day. I have the GPS waypoints so we can go there next week if all goes well.  I'll phone ya next time Gerritt... guess I should have been thinking better eh?
Ya.  After all the pho we've been through together.  What am I, chopped liver?   Congrats on your great day on the hardwater, Parker.
looks like all this complaining may just have to cause a G2G...
Nice one Bill,  No offence but from a distance, your hut looked like a port-o-let!  You and your brother look quite similar, what's the age difference?
Great report!  If I had the success you did on the hard water, then I'd consider ice fishing...LOL.
